Detailed Description

Reduces the size of entities by taking a local mininum.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.ErosionFilter.erode ( final LatLonGrid  input  )  

00032                                                    {
00033         LatLonGrid output = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input);
00034         output.fill(output.getMissing());
00035         int[][] outData = output.getData();
00036         int[][] inData = input.getData();
00037         int hx = halfSize;
00038         int hy = halfSize;
00039         int nx = inData.length;
00040         int ny = inData[0].length;
00041         for (int i=hx; i < (nx-hx); ++i){
00042             for (int j=hy; j < (ny-hy); ++j){
00043                 int min = input.getMissing();
00044                 boolean set = false;
00045                 for (int m=-hx; m <= hx; ++m){
00046                     for (int n=-hy; n <= hy; ++n){
00047                         int inval = inData[i+m][j+n];
00048                         if (inval != input.getMissing()){
00049                             if ( !set || inval < min ){
00050                                 min = inval;
00051                                 set = true;
00052                             }
00053                         }
00054                     }
00055                 }
00056                 if ( set ){
00057                     outData[i][j] = min;
00058                 }
00059             }
00060         }
00061         return output;
00062     }
